markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dinosaur Boots](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1299)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 42

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The tough, scaled leather of these heavy boots comes from a mighty dinosaur, granting you the steadiness of a lumbering beast. Any time an action or effect would cause you to make a [forced movement](/Rules.aspx?ID=451), roll a DC 17 flat check. On a success, the forced movement fails to affect you.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> command ([magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [morph](/Traits.aspx?ID=113), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You grow, gaining the effects of [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) for 1 minute. During that time, you gain dinosaur features; your legs and feet transform into a dinosaur's. You gain a foot unarmed attack that has the same statistics as your fist unarmed attack, except its damage die is increased from 1d4 to 1d6. Once during the duration, you can use the [Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39) 3-action activity to Trample creatures one size smaller than you or smaller. This deals an amount of damage to each creature equal to that of your foot unarmed attack (including any extra weapon damage dice, bonuses, or additional damage as normal), with a DC 27 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. You can Dismiss the activation.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Dinosaur Boots
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 42

**Price** 950 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 16"
pfs="Standard"
>
Dinosaur Boots (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 42

**Price** 9,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The activation makes you grow to size Huge, if you choose, with the effects of 4th-level _enlarge_. Either way, the damage die of your foot unarmed attack increases from 1d4 to 1d8, and you can use Trample as many times as you want during the activation.
name: Dinosaur Boots
